title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
writer: John Logan, Hugh Wheeler, Christopher Bond
actors: Johnny Depp, Helena Bonham Carter, Alan Rickman
plot: The legendary tale of a barber who returns from wrongful imprisonment to 1840s London, bent on revenge for the rape and death of his wife, and resumes his trade while forming a sinister partnership with his fellow tenant, Mrs. Lov...
